mapper.insert: insert into `vkc`.`leads` (`name`, source, investPartner, manager, company, industry, `location`, summary, description, `status`, last_change, `next`, `source_reason`, `pass_reason`, `meeting_record`, `bp_record`) values (#{name}, #{source}, #{investPartner}, #{manager}, #{company}, #{industry}, #{location}, #{summary}, #{description}, #{status}, #{lastChange}, #{next}, #{sourceReason}, #{passReason}, #{meetingRecord}, #{bpRecord})
